entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Brooks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:52 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brooks 8:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle this evening. Periods of light snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Fog patches. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
